description: Create a lineup job production plan
permissions: User must be authorized for the related lineup; LineupJobProductionPlanPolicy delegates access to the lineup relationship.
side_effects: Creates a lineup job production plan linking a lineup and a job production plan.
validation_notes: Requires --lineup and --job-production-plan. job_production_plan_id must be unique. Job production plan customer must match lineup customer. Job production plan calculated_start_at must fall within the lineup start_at_range.
